Across a wide plain, a broken stone path stretches onward, barely visible beneath drifting ash and dust. On both sides, the ground is cracked and pale, carved by time and strange energies. Scattered across this expanse grow colonies of strange mushrooms, grey with bluish-green hues, pulsating softly in the darkness. Bioluminescent spores rise from their surfaces, glowing faintly as they float through the stagnant air. Filaments stretch between the fungal growths like brittle webs.

Side view of an underground sanctuary. On the wall, an engraving represents a giant creature with vast wings and hundreds of elongated tentacles sprouting from the bottom of its body are reaching out for the pillars on both sides, a small refined ruby is subtly embedded in its chest, while magical runes circle above it. The tentacles of the engraving reach far away to the pillars.  In the middle ground, a few steps lead up to a cubic altar of polished stone on which sits an ornate golden box covered by a magnificent green scarf. the floor itself is made of sand, as if the scene were set in the middle of the desert. The ivory walls on the sides are in arab architecture. Smooth white tentacles climb on the pillars. A narrow arched passage leads deeper into the darkness on the left, while carved steps descend on the right. The whole scene exudes solitude and temporal mystery. A dim light comes from the ceiling.
